data.name: jingor mine
data.detailed_description:
PLAY MINE SWEEPING IN THE CUBE EXPANSION(JINGOR FACE)!

Jingor Mine is a puzzle game, can be used as a hobby, can challenge intelligence, can be leisure entertainment.

In the jingor face, click the left mouse button to open the grid in sweeper mode, and click the left mouse button to mark mines when switching to mine marking mode.
Of particular interest is the mines on the other side of an edge in the jingor face.

data.short_description: PLAY MINE SWEEPING IN THE CUBE EXPANSION(JINGOR FACE)! RULE:In the jingor face, click the left mouse button to open the grid in sweeper mode, and to mark mines when switching to mine marking mode. data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 3000
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS X v10.7
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
